title: FeedCard
description: Schema for a feed card in the OWF (One World Feed) feed

type.description: Content type of the card, determines layout and accent colour

title.description: Primary headline or title of the card

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 date-time when the content was published or created

summary.description: Short excerpt or description of the content

url.description: Absolute URL to the full content

thumbnail.description: Absolute URL to a thumbnail or cover image

tags.description: Semantic labels applied to this card (e.g. breaking, new, celebratory)

mood.description: Emotional tone of the content, used to apply mood-based theme styling

region.description: Geographic region the content is associated with

duration.description: Human-readable duration string, used for podcast and music cards (e.g. '42 min')

artist.description: Artist or creator name, used for music cards

album.description: Album or playlist name, used for music cards

author.description: Author or handle, used for social cards

likes.description: Engagement count (likes, reactions), used for social cards

isLive.description: Whether the card represents an actively live stream or broadcast

viewers.description: Current viewer or listener count, used for live cards

aiModel.description: Name of the AI model that generated or curated the content, used for ai cards
